title: Endings
author: verias
text:
Hidden Name: Marius Hjelseth

And thus wraps Chapter 5. What'd you guys think?

We're taking the week off, so, we'll see you guys next Monday, with something fun, and news about Chapter 6!

See you then!

replies.author: Gunsolo*Guest*
replies.text: Hahahah, so Circe really IS a dragon after all.

replies.author: adamas*Guest*
replies.text: Oy, when Dragons wage war, they're usually all that's left standing at th end of it.
